overview: Mr. Shay Shaham is responsible for all activity in SeamBI’s Israel offices, overseeing all R&D and operations. Prior to this role, Shay built SeamBI’s graphic team and led the design of its groundbreaking in-house graphic solution and procedures. Prior to SeamBI, Mr. Shaham served for eight and a half years in the Electronics Research Department of the Israel Defense Forces (IDF) Intelligence Corps. In the IDF, he held a number of positions – starting as an embedded systems engineer for mission-critical projects, progressing to the position of a team leader, managing a large-scale techno-operational project, and then managing a multi-disciplinary section with more than 40 hardware and software engineers. In his last position, Shay served as the manager of a complex hardware and software system development project that included more than one hundred engineers. He received the Director of Intelligence Technological Innovation Award in 2005. Shay earned both his Bachelors in Electrical Engineering and Masters Degree in Electrical Engineering and Management from Tel Aviv University.
